document_data.name: Skrianna Shadowdusk
document_data.mainbody: '''Skrianna Shadowdusk''' was a human wizard of the [[Shadowdusk]] family who lived in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Skrianna was a student of the magical school at the [[Dweomercore]] level of Undermountain.
document_data.History: Skrianna enrolled in the school sometime before [[1492 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Skrianna was always in search of a challenge and for this she enrolled in the academy. She was a rude, privileged individual, disliking common people and with a sadistic side in controlling other people with her magic. Skrianna never trusted newcomers.
document_data.Relationships: Skrianna had always at her side a [[shield guardian]] bodyguard and a [[grell]] valet.
